description: ‚úÖ Sign-up for a free cluster at: https://bit.ly/mongodb-free ‚úÖ Get help on our Community Forums: https://bit.ly/mongodb-community In this video, I‚Äôll show you how to import data into your MongoDB database 3 different ways.
